content: This test fixture /FHIR3-0-0-Connectathon15/Terminology/JSON Format/_reference/resources/extensional-case-1.json does not match with (at least) the test case /FHIR3-0-0-Connectathon15/Terminology/JSON Format/Validate-code/Client Assigned Id/connectathon-15-ts-validate-code-client-id-json

Michael, thank you. I have created an AEGIS internal Touchstone JIRA tracking ticket for this issue (TS-312). We'll be reviewing and applying any required changes and corrections to the Connectathon15 tests over the next few weeks before we get to Madrid.
Noticed that the Extensional Value Sets 1 and 4 have changed. Just made the relevant changes to my server to get it out of the red. Any more curveballs on the way before Madrid? :)

Peter, apologies for not updating you. The changes were in response to feedback from John with Apelon. I updated those ValueSets for extensional 1 and 4 when I ported the tests from FHIR 1.8.0 to 3.0.0 and I missed updating all of the corresponding TestScripts. As far as I know, that should be it for now. If anymore changes do come up, I'll be sure to send out a notification on this stream.

@Michael Lawley Just wanted to let you know that the updates mentioned by @Peter Jordan have been uploaded to Touchstone and correct your reported issue (TS-312). You may re-run these tests at your convenience.
Thanks @Richard Ettema . What's the story on suggesting new tests?
@Michael Lawley I am always open for suggestions. :) Please let me know via the Touchstone_Support@aegis.net email.
